article_title: SC Gov. Nikki Haley’s year under the hot lights
article_text:
Some talk about Haley as a possible vice presidential candidate

She has ideas for what Republican hopefuls should say – and where they should go

Haley says she’s not sure whether she will endorse anyone

article_metadata.news-keywords: Nikki Haley, Republican, primary, Romney, endorse, gop, south carolina, governor, presidential candidates
article_metadata.description: When the national spotlight fell on South Carolina last year, it focused on a string of deadly tragedies.
